colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA'I SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I BTZAN MDOS, ,AU RGYAN PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI MDZAD PA DANG YANG MKHAS PAS MDZAD PA'I ZUR BDE BAS BTZAN MDOS SOGS 'GA' ZHIG LA BYIN RLABS MED PA 'GA' ZHIG GZHUGS MED, ,LA LAR LAM STON DANG GSHEGS PA'I GIS GSOL DANG BZLOG PAR MED PAR, ,SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SPYI DANG DANG BYE BRAG KHA BSGYUR BTZAN MDOS KYIS GZHI BLANGS KYANG, ,GZHAN YANG MKHAS PAS MDZAD PA'I BTZAN MDOS SOGS PA NAS CHOS RJE MING CAN DGE DAR ZHES BYA BAS BSGRIGS BGYIS YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG AU LA TZI THU GNANG GSO BA'I CES 'DI RTEN 'BREL BA'I SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS BDE BSKYED GSUM TSOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
